item.title: Review of AMA with BlockArk
item.description: At 7pm on September 17th, Stegos founder Joel conducted a 100-minute AMA live broadcast to the community. It was broadcast simultaneously across 9 different communities, with a peak viewership of 4,500 people as Joel shared the twists and turns of creating Stegos. The technical details of Stegos and the live Q&A discussion format made for an exciting evening. Below you’ll find a transcript of last night’s AMA. This guest for this time is Joel, who is the founder of Stegos, an experienced hacker and blockchain pioneer.
